resources.string: Static variables are associated with each instance of the object
A private member is only accessible within the same class as it is declared
A single method call can return multiple types in Java
Calling a method is the same as defining it
Methods declared public in a superclass also must be public in all subclasses.
Objects of a subclass can be assigned to a super class reference.
Method overriding is a process of defining more than one method in a class with same name differentiated by method signature
